newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - First Virginia a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - First Virginia a buy.

text.p: -- UBS Securities analyst Thomas Hanley said in a research note that he initiated coverage of First Virginia Banks Inc with a buy recommendation.

-- He set a "takeout price" of $65 per share, since the company is "attractive to superregional acquirers" because of the company's "high level of profitability, and outstanding credit quality combined with its significant presence in the coveted Virginia and Maryland markets ..."
-- 1997 earnings estimate is $3.80 per share and the 1998 estimate is $4.15 per share.
-- Shares slipped 1/2 to 52-1/8 in early New York Stock Exchange trade.
